ygData.subject: Building begins
ygData.msgSnippet: Say, Red Bolt, Remember those ruins we found south of the alliance base? Yes? Red Bolt replied. Suppose we salvage what was left of that base and began

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

"Say, Red Bolt, Remember those ruins we found south of the alliance base?" 
"Yes?"Red Bolt replied. "Suppose we salvage what was left of that base and 
began building a new one in Australia? It might be a good place to train new 
recruits, and prepare an effective peace keeping force." "Yes," Red Bolt 
replied. "Yes, if only we could recruit a few troops, it would make an 
excellent base."

--part1_87.61ac07e.27a4fdbd_boundary
